cause.description:
This piece of legislation will make it illegal to import, export, and sell in the United States ANY product that was made in a sweatshop. The definition of a sweatshop is laid out within the legislation. This law, if passed, would be revolutionary for the labor movement and for laborers throughout the world. It has as its major backer the National Labor Committee, and I hope you will join in supporting this legislation as well!!
For more info visit: http://www.nlcnet.org/article.php?id=242
Take action! Write your Congressmen/women and tell them you want them to support this bill!
For Senators: www.senate.gov/general/contact_information/senators_cfm.cfm
For Representatives: http://www.house.gov/writerep/
With your support, your letters, your voice, we can end the use of sweatshops and bring justice to the millions of workers around the globe!
1. All workers have the right to fair working conditions & wages.
2. The American people have a right to know that the products they buy were made by people who were treated fairly.
3. The companies must be held accountable for the ways in which their products are made.
cause.mission: End the abuse of foreign workers
cause.name: Decent Working Conditions and Fair Competition Act
